name: PLANET STRIKE (Game The Future)
description:
Defend your system and Conquer your opponents' systems. Add your Friends, battle their Planets and loot their Resources! Boost your Planetary Defenses and manage your Empire strategically. Battle the Artificial Intelligence and conquer their planets!

The Battle never stops! Upgrade your Ships and weapons! Trade at Planet Orbital Shops - buy Ships and Weapons or Scrap them for Repairs.

Explore the Planet Strike Universe, marvel at its beauty and temper its devious inhabitants. The enemy is overwhelming, but you have the tech, the Will-Power, a whole galaxy funding you and a Thirst for Conquest! Build your Galactic Empire, reach and exceed your limits!

The decision is yours: HOW WILL YOU RULE ?
